Reviews.Title: “For the one night traveler”
Reviews.Author: charnevb
Reviews.Content: My husband and I decided to stay here over New Years just because the whole of Dubai was already fully booked. We basically only slept there. The rooms are sufficient but small and you cant open any windows. The breakfast was very limited and the same for 7 days straight. We couldn't order anything else even if we wanted to. Staff was always friendly. The metro rail's walking distance away. I would say that this is perfect for a business person staying for 1 or 2 nights maximum. Oh...and take your own pillow if you're fussy, theirs are about 2cm thick.

Reviews.Title: “Thumbs up for the improvments”
Reviews.Author: cyr1ne
Reviews.Content: I am so happy to see the improvments Holiday Inn Internet City Hotel is doing. Besides the friendly staff and clean rooms. I was happy that there are improvments in their offering; they reception have offered me complimentary water because I am Platinuim Elite guest and FREE internet usage in my room and lobby and 50% discount voucher on their friday brunch at Vista. They have started installing WIFI in the rooms as we have aked them to in our remarks. It is good to know that this hotel does care about it's clients and do take our points into consideration. I will be back next month

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful hotel @ business area!!!”
Reviews.Author: beenakothari
Reviews.Content: The location of this hotel is strategic. Few must visit plAces of dubai are not very far!!! Value for money spent!! One thing which I didn't like - internet connectivity is chargeable in lobby area too!!! Best place in the hotel is - rooftop testaurant!! It has a very beautiful view!!!

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Choice!”
Reviews.Author: Lacoste321
Reviews.Content: This hotel is perfect for leisure and business same time, it is near JBR,Burj Al Arab, dubai marina and mall of the emirates which was suitable for us.All the staff in the hotel were very nice since we checked in which is something you don't experience everywhere they are very helpful. The room was very nice and clean and we could see Burj Al Arab from it. It was a nice experience and we will sure visit again when we are in UAE.

Reviews.Title: “relaxing time”
Reviews.Author: Paty D
Reviews.Content: i went to dubai with my friends for vacation, we choose this hotel because we heard good feedback about it and because the value was fair. i really liked the holiday in express, it is sooo clean, relaxing and the staff is very friendly. it also have a very good location, it is near the malls, the beach, downtown and all fun places! i think this hotel is the best choice for another visit to dubai!

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable accomodation for a short stay”
Reviews.Author: Tanglewild
Reviews.Content: An ideal hotel for a short, inexpensive stay, business or leisure. Our stay was in February 2012, the staff were helpful. The breakfast is typical HIE plus a few local quirks!

Reviews.Title: “great stay !”
Reviews.Author: walid f
Reviews.Content: it was a great stay at the hotel. very clean hotel with very friendly staff. the rooms are very nice and clean and a nice complementary breakfast. i really recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay!”
Reviews.Author: Marck H
Reviews.Content: i was in Dubai on a business trip, i stayed at this hotel for 6 nights. i had a great stay: 1st the staff were very friendly and always smiling and happy to help. 2nd the rooms are very clean and comfortable with high speed internet connection. 3rd the breakfast had a large variety of items. in addition to that the location of the hotel is very convenient and close to the main destinations. when you stay at this hotel, don't miss the opportunity of trying "Vista" the fine dining rooftop restaurant. to sum it up, i will surely be staying at this hotel for all my coming trips to Dubai.

Reviews.Title: “Never disappointing!”
Reviews.Author: AmandaWillis1980
Reviews.Content: We have spent five nights at this hotel to attend an exhibition at the trade center. I have tried it last year and I have convinced my colleagues this time to book it with me, as expected it did not disappoint me at all. The reservation clerk was extremely accommodating and helpful and assisted my friend in getting a entry visa. The facilities were very clean as always, room was great, clean and linens/towels were clean and abundant. Location is not far from the trade center 25 minutes by cab, and the metro station is just at a walking distance. Malls, shopping and beach are not far either. Just speak to the reception staff and they will recommend great places for you! I will always recommend this hotel and will definitely stay whenever in Dubai. Breakfast was much better than last time, my advice is to come down early for breakfast before the crowd and the long queue waiting .Unfortunately we didn’t have the chance to try the nice rooftop restaurant this time.

Reviews.Title: “Find something else”
Reviews.Author: oldfatfella
Reviews.Content: Checked in. Went to room. Found the furnishings to be old and worn. Decided to stay at least the night. Asked the desk for a room service menu, got a pizza delivery menu. Okay don't need that. Asked for a method to hook up to the internet. "Oh, you need a data cable!" "Well send you one." It arrived and couldn't hook up. "We'll get your another". They did. An hour later. The desk chair was old, worn to the point past use. Requested another. Was told they didn't have anything else. Went to the lobby, pointed out that there were acceptable chairs int he lobby, restaurant and meeting rooms. "Oh, let me call the night manager". "Well, yes. We'll delver one to your room!". Avoid this hotel unless you're desperate!!!

Reviews.Title: “All what you need”
Reviews.Author: Ron294005
Reviews.Content: I have visited this hotel in december for my business meeting, so fascinated by its services as well the efficiency of the hotel staff. Loved their breakfast, price quality it is the excellent choice, the hotel will be my only choice when I visit Dubai.

Reviews.Title: “Another you get what you pay for...........”
Reviews.Author: Theyoung1
Reviews.Content: I booked this room through my Discover Card travel agency, getting a really good deal, only needing to take a printed copy of my prepaid voucher. Once I got to the hotel, the front desk clerk told me my room was ready, but there was no water, and he pointed to the kiosk and said there is bottled water in there. I thought that was nice, and helped myself to two bottles and went to my room. Within minutes the phone rang and it was the front desk asking me if I took two bottles of water, and I stated yes. I was taken aback when he then asked me why I didn't pay for them. I told him he told me to help myself, but he said that was not what he meant. Rather than argue with me further, he informed me he would go ahead and just put them on my room at $3.00 apiece. Not 15 minutes later, the phone rang again; this time the front desk informed me the voucher didn't include 10 of the 20% tax. He asked that I come down and settle up, so I grabbed my voucher and proceeded to the front desk again. Once I got there, I produced the voucher which clearly stated I had paid in full, including taxes. The same clerk argued with me that I was going to have to pay the extra 10%, or Discover would charge me later anyway. I showed him the fine print, and he then said he wanted to make a copy of the voucher. I informed him this error was between Discover Card and the hotel, and if they sold the room for a lower price that is wasn't my fault. Five minutes later he came back and told me they would look into it. He then pointed to my voucher which showed the cash back bonus I am to get for using the Discover Card Travel services. He tried to tell me this was the 10% I was going to be charged by Discover Card. He clearly did not understand the Discover Card Cash Back Bonus Program. At this point I almost lost it, and started to ask for a refund, telling him I could have stayed at a 100 other hotels and in the first 15 minutes, I had already had two problems with the hotel. He backed down and told me everything would be ok, that he would even give me free water. I hated to get rough with the guy but sternness seems to be the only approach to take to get things done in Dubai. Anyway, other than the shower being clogged all week, the room was ok as with the free breakfast. There were one, maybe two other restaurants within 2-3 blocks from the hotel and the Metro station was another 3-4 blocks from the restaurants. Though I am a frequent traveler to Dubai, I will make sure to stay clear of this hotel. The final question was, was I going to be billed for the water, or not? When I went to check out, a young lady was working and told me I still owed $6 for water. I asked for a receipt and she stated that I could not have one since my bill was settled by the voucher. I asked her what is going to keep another employee from charging me again, and she just shrugged her shoulders. So much for the free water after all!

Reviews.Title: “Adequate for a quick overnight but wouldn't stay longer.”
Reviews.Author: LoyaltyLobby
Reviews.Content: This hotel is located close to the Dubai Marina but there really isn’t anything in the immediate area for touristic purposes. To be fair this hotel is not geared for tourists but for business travelers visiting the nearby companies/educational institutions. The really nice looking lobby and restaurant area gives a wrong impression.The rooms are looking dated and has probably the smallest TV set I have seen for some time. Hotel is fine for a quick overnight but wouldn’t spend more time there. There are no bellboys working at this hotel, so I had the security guy helping me to load the bags that I had in to a cart, which I later took to the room by myself. There was no separate are for Priority Club Platinum members, or should I say that there was but it was not manned. Overall the check in was ok. I was promptly checked in to a room 112. Not sure if they have any better rooms than 112, but as Platinum member I wasn’t overly satisfied. Not sure what I can say about it. It was rather basic as one can expect from a Holiday Inn Express hotel. But even then, if the hotel is located in the INTERNET CITY, they should probably have wireless internet access. The wired one worked, but the Ethernet cable was super short. I probably should start carrying a small wireless router with me. Fitness center was tot really adequate in today’s world. It might have been acceptable ten years ago. Should be updated. Like everything else this hotel breakfast was so sol. Was not great but wasn’t horrible either. Should I say adequate? Not sure what the unidentifiable eggs dish was, however. Everything fell apart at check out. This hotel participates to the Dynamic Currency Conversion. Basically their bank converts the local currency AED to the currency of your credit card and takes, on this case, 3.6% commission. The Visa/MasterCard/Amex all would do it automatically using market rates. Your bank or credit card issue may charge a free for foreign transaction but it is most certainly less than 3.6%. The key here is that they should OFFER it to you. They should NOT automatically do it. I insisted that they charge in local currency. This resulted the checking out taking forever. They charged incorrectly twice before manager got involved who knew how to do this correctly. There is absolutely NO ADVANTAGE for you when they do this DCC. It is just more money to the hotel, as the bank splits some of this “fee” with the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great new years eve deal spent without music”
Reviews.Author: AviatorDubai
Reviews.Content: We were 4 friends booked at the Vista restaurant for new years eve celebrations. Hotel offered a very attractive deal with unlimited drinks and a 3 course diner which was great. Food and drinks were of good quality and big portions served at correct tempretures. service was swift by friendly, attentive staff. Dissapointing aspect was that the entire sound system at vista went horribly wrong at a time it was most needed. lousy speakers with continuously crackling music went on forever. Although technical glitches of this nature are to be expected, a simple explanation or an apology by any ranking staff (or any staff for that matter) was not available.So was the innitiative to atleast completely shut down the rattling music system, which was annoying. In all fairness, rest of the new years eve was well organized. We enjoyed the atmosphere, food and the drink as well as the attentive and friendly service.

Reviews.Title: “It is way more than budget hotel”
Reviews.Author: Mouhannad F
Reviews.Content: I had less expectations when I learned that I am booked at a budget hotel. The staff were very friendly at all times. Rooms are very simple good in size and clean. Essential items for breakfast. An amazing roof top bar. I loved that hotel, will certainly recommend it for co-workers and will be my choice when I return to Dubai.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel for business travellers.....”
Reviews.Author: Maverick_Varun
Reviews.Content: A nice budget hotel, it has all facilities that you need after a long day at work i.e. a nice restaurant and bar, neat and clean rooms to jump into and a nice gym. I loved the location as its close to my office in Dubai and its a very peaceful area.... staff was friendly, ofcourse with no service, coordination with staff wasnt much required... Not a luxury but surely has it needs after a days work...

Reviews.Title: “clean and tidy hotel”
Reviews.Author: Habib_10
Reviews.Content: The hotel is nice and good. Its near to Dubai Marina and JBR. The staff was very friendly with us. The hotel offered a free breakfast which is a good deal. The rooms was clean and tidy. However, comparing with other hotels is Dubai in the same range, the furniture was outdated. In addition, the T.V was an old type not a plasma. The internet was chargeable with high price. The water pressure in the bathroom wasn't strong. The bed was good and comfortable. We had a good sleep. On the 2nd day the bathroom wasn't clean in good way. The trash bin wasn't removed. One towel was only there while we need 2. No new napkins were provided and replaced with the finished one! I requested to clean the bathroom twice and waited for 45 minutes until one of the staff arrived to clean the bathroom. Although we faced all these things, however, we had a good time there.

Reviews.Title: “Staying here - basic, cheap and clean”
Reviews.Author: CharlieBristol
Reviews.Content: The hotel is quite a way out from down town but near some shops etc if you don't want to eat out. You are in one of the business zones. Hotel is clean and tidy with a very strong room freshner smell. Beds are clean and comfortable. As you would expect with an Express it is very basic but functional. Staff friendly and helpful and rooms are quiet. You will need to turn the AC off at night as it is very noisy. Hotel taxi is more expensive than regular taxis so haggle over price.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful stay! need a try”
Reviews.Author: Royotto C
Reviews.Content: we actually with my family had a very memorable experience in dubai in this rooftop restaurant , u will not be able to leave the table and the view, u can enjoy all dubai lighting while having dinner. The rooms are excellent, the service is very good. transportation are easy t get also. Thank you and all the best

Reviews.Title: “Very convenient choice and very good location”
Reviews.Author: Laure a
Reviews.Content: I was in a small trip to Dubai and was looking for convenient location and good price. after searching i found this great hotel in the middle of media city, very convenient to access, close to the metro and to mall of the emirates. it was a great experience actually compared to my previous experience with another hotel. the staff was very friendly and welcoming and professional. a wonderful restaurant at the top is a non comparable experience, wow this view to dubai, burj al arab...the space is for you, and the food is tasty.. pls try this restaurant especially now with the good weather. i will come back of course whenever i come to dubai and i advise everybody to try it.. thanks for the staff and for this stay..

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay with Friends”
Reviews.Author: Cooxie
Reviews.Content: My friend and I wanted to go during the holiday to Dubai with and we couldn't find any room in any hotel in Dubai, my friend was looking for a 4 or 5 stars hotel, so after looking everywhere, i mentioned my previous experience to her with holiday inn express and we decided to check if we can find room there. lucky us we found a room but the price was a bit high compared to my previous stay, but it is worth it, when we walked in my friend was amazed by the lobby, "it looks like a 4 stars hotel and not 3 stars" she mentioned. what i liked were the new items in the breakfast, some hot food which was great. Everything in general was nice, we were amazed by the cleanness and freshness of the rooms and the very friendly staff greeting us with a smile every time they see us. I believe from now on i will only stay at this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Poor hotel, well located for Media and Internet City”
Reviews.Author: IamfromBarcelona
Reviews.Content: There are several Holiday Inn hotels in Dubai and this is probably the worst one. Quite poor rooms, small, and extremely bad service. It can be useful if you are in Dubai for a few days, in a business trip and you need to be close to Dubai Media-Internet City area. But it is far from the World Trade Centre (fairs). If you are on holidays, there thousands of better option. P.D: the restaurant on the top floor, called Vista, has a nice view, it is elegant, and food and service are quite good. It has nothing to do with the hotel, weird...

Reviews.Title: “Business stay only”
Reviews.Author: SJAIRATH
Reviews.Content: Professional hotel with hard rules. Stayed many times for business trip as it is at walkable distance from the Knowledge Village. Location is good, and most of the local people are aware of this Hotel. Breakfast is continental only with limited choices - one can live with it only for short stays. Internet is free in lobby but paid in rooms. Bathrooms are very small. No attractions nearby like Malls, shopping attractions, etc. It is not noisy as some of the other Hotels in Dubai as there is no nonsense around this hotel - one can expect peaceful sleeps after day's work. Airport trasfers are reasonable and very efficient.

Reviews.Title: “Value for money, 'no nonsense' hotel”
Reviews.Author: Mahesh_Ayyagari
Reviews.Content: Considering the frills available in Dubai, this is a no frills hotel. Clean and well kept rooms, clean hotel overall, good service. No frills because there is no room service. And if you want to use the free internet, it is available over wireless only in the lobby floor. To use internet in your room, you need to pay. Nice bar but almost always empty. Convenient buffet lunch at the coffee shop. Breakfast can look better. Nice roof top restaurant but limited menu. Part of the priority club rewards across many hotels in the world. The hotel also organizes Dubai visas if required, which need to be requested for at the time of booking. These are single entry visas only. Very friendly staff and good service. Value for money because to get this level of comfort in Dubai paying under $150 a night is great.

Reviews.Title: “Terrible experience”
Reviews.Author: jayjo_11
Reviews.Content: I stayed here for an overnight stay on business and I could not wait for the night to be over. The room was a smoking room and it had a terrible smell. The carpet was stained and internet seemed too expensive. Will not stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: AmandaWillis1980
Reviews.Content: It was really a great place to stay with easy access to everything. I came in business trip and stayed for 2 nights. the place was perfectly clean, was warmly recieved, the receptionist was very professional and welcoming. the breakfast was good also especially with the additive items. Amazing restaurant on the roof ..an experience not to miss.. It is really a very good choice for business stay or even for short vacation.

Reviews.Title: “Poor Service”
Reviews.Author: Ann B
Reviews.Content: Clean,air con was silent, breakfast basic but service was very poor. Waited 25 mins for service at the bar, having to ask reception to get someone to serve. Ordered a meal for dinner in"The Great Room" only to still be sitting and waiting after 25 mins for my meal.Great Restuarant on the roof, but did not feel this was advertised to their advantage. Reception usually too busy to deal with more than 2 Customers at a time. Card entry on door went wrong twice and I was moved to another room after 2 days but the room they put me in had been used by a smoker, although they said not and could not smell the smoke

Reviews.Title: “Typical business hotel”
Reviews.Author: Bjcfam
Reviews.Content: very clean, in the center or business area. Reliable and easy to reach. Value for money is very good. Breakfast can be improved. For a typical business stay, it is recommended.

Reviews.Title: “more than expected”
Reviews.Author: cyr1ne
Reviews.Content: Large lobby, friendly front desk staff, professional approach from all employees, clean room and good mattresses and comfortable pillows. The breakfast doesnt have hot items, yet it has the essential items. Good value for money and more.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel, very clean, breakfast not so great”
Reviews.Author: I_love_my_trips
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed for 3 nights in this hotel with a friend and we found the hotel very clean and comfortable. The location is very easy to find and specially if you have your own vehicle. The only thing we found not so good was the breakfast, which had not too much variety. I recommend you to book in advance since the hotel appears to be very busy all time with business people. However, the rooms are quiet and you can sleep very good.

Reviews.Title: “Great way to launch off to Knowledge Village or to the Burj”
Reviews.Author: AbuDhabiWil
Reviews.Content: I stayed here only because it was just next door to the prometrics test centre in Knowledge Village. Has a decent restaurant with themed nights. You can grab a subway in the middle of the night opposite the hotel. no room service as expected from a HI Express. Standard rooms with no upgrades.

Reviews.Title: “Mixed review”
Reviews.Author: littleanna777
Reviews.Content: Me and my friend arrived quite late and reception staff were very friendly and nice, only when we got to the room (144) we realised that we did not have any big towels, kettle, remote control and it felt that the room was not ready for us, moreover the connection room was left open and there was a very strong smell of paint coming inside our room. Next day we had to change our room and were offered 2 different rooms, in the end agreed to room 310 with view on Burj al Arab. Security and reception staff were great, especially Synthia, she is a star, nothing was a trouble for her. We stayed at the hotel for 7 days, the breakfast was very boring, cereal, cheese, bread, probably good on a business travel 2-3 days, but certainly not for holiday. Internet is a rip off and only in the lobby. Overall our stay was okay, definitely will not come back, but for business I think it is an adequate hotel to stay.

Reviews.Title: “A oasis of silence...”
Reviews.Author: Simone_Bonzanini
Reviews.Content: It's a very nice place, not too far from the life and suitable for have rest. 200mts from the city train, 5' from Dubai Marina or Green Dubai and the Mall of the Emirates, it's a nice small hotel with friendly staff, clean and confortable rooms. There are a restaurant in the rooft and a buffet restaurant on the ground floor, in any case the food are ok.

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyable Stay”
Reviews.Author: Cooxie
Reviews.Content: We stayed last week at Holiday Inn Express Internet city and we had a very good time, the staff were very helpful and friendly. The hotel is at a walking distance from the metro station which was convenient to us. Rooms were very clean and you must try the rooftop restaurant it is very elegant with an amazing view where you can spot Burj Al Arab as well and the food is very tasty.

Reviews.Title: “Great budget hotel with poor internet...yes it's located in "internet city"”
Reviews.Author: sumo_trades
Reviews.Content: Great staff, nice clean modern rooms. Couldnt get very hot water, just warm and the tv selection is a little poor for english speakers. Great free breakfast with cheeses, tomato, fruits, cereals, breads and juice. But the real let down is internet. Wireless is only available in lobby and costs 25d for 1hr. My recomendation is sign up for du wireless for 10d for 1hr, theres a hot spot 5min away in Knowledge City foodcourt, you just visit their website with your credit card. Its very silly popping downstairs all the time to check emails, you should see the lobby in the evening with businessmen checking in. Also you cant check in to this location on Facebook :) so good budget hotel but not if you are big into keeping in touch with family and friends.

Reviews.Title: “Great 2 star hotel”
Reviews.Author: AAchille
Reviews.Content: I stayed there because it was so close to my college. The welcome was great, smiley and proff. staff as if it is a 5 star, fast check in, room was clean simple, yet very comfortable bed and most of all pillows, the TV is old and the channels are limited, wired internet... at any rate it's a 2 star. Every now and then the reception staff used to check on my when seeing me in the lobby and it felt WOW. I had dinner at Le vista and it had a nice view over Burj Al Arab, good place for shisha as well. Good taste of coffee at the breakfast, quick check out, beautiful impression left by the staff attitude, I recommend it and I will be back.

Reviews.Title: “Expensive Internet @ HIE-Internet City ... :(”
Reviews.Author: rovin-ronin
Reviews.Content: Stayed here 2 years ago, and was put up here again for business trip first week of June 2011. Things have not improved. Sad that they charge you for Internet connection, and it is not cheap. Room was looking pretty tired, kind of shabby and sort of run-down. Five of the ~ 20 TV channels were just dead air and several others had reception issues where there was no audio or marginal signal. The bathroom fittings were as worn as the room furniture -- shower door that didn't close all the way and several cracked tiles glued in a haphazard manner. I am not completely convinced they did not find a bunch of faux display beds (cardboard forms that you can drape sheets over to look like a bed) for the rooms. If you like sleeping on a concrete slab with either a ridiculously soft pillow or an incompressible pillow ("your CHOICE of pillow"), then the bed will be to your liking; if you want to get some rest in your bed you should look elsewhere. The "complimentary buffet" consisted of two different frozen, reconstituted juices (varied each day but all were equally horrid), 3 different types of cereals, fresh apples/bananas, sliced vegetables (cucumbers, olives, tomatoes), bowls of yogurt/hummus, two types of sliced cheeses, and several jams for small croissant rolls and slices of bread with a toaster. Not a very substantial breakfast but technically a buffet I suppose. Aside from being close enough to walk to Knowledge Village, there is not anything else to do. I am certain there are better choices for lodging and the people who rate this place 4 stars must not get out much. I can't say there have been any discernible improvements in the two years since last I stayed here, I may have even been in the same "non-smoking" room that was next to and across from smoking rooms...brilliant. Just place damp towels at the base of the door and find something to do online -- oh wait, they charge you 25 AED ($7US) for an hour of Internet... So much for second chances. Save your money and look elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: “But for internet, stay was value for money”
Reviews.Author: ankur1979
Reviews.Content: I stayed for 6 nights, although my plan was to stay there for 10 nights. But due to some business requirement, my plan changed. Well, amenities and room was good. Food was not bad either. Only thing that I found costly was their internet rates. As Country INN Express is known as business hotel, I would expect a free or cheap internet. They also do not have concept of room service, which is ok. But at times, room service is badly required. If they can work on these two things, stay would be more comfortable. But yes, staff was friendly. It was good stay overall

Reviews.Title: “Value for money but not as good as it once was”
Reviews.Author: Spurskingy
Reviews.Content: The staff are still as friendly as always and I have stayed here a few times in the last 3 years. Be aware that there is nothing to see or do within walking distance but the staff will arrange a taxi very easily and Mall of the Emirates, and its Metro station, is a 5 minute car ride. House keeping was patchy on this trip. Some days I had no hand towel or bath mat and other days I had all my towels and 3 face cloths. Value for money though.

Reviews.Title: “So Friendly Stuff”
Reviews.Author: Rania_Hakim
Reviews.Content: This is not my first stay at Holyday Inn Express may be it is my tenth time. I love this Hotel because of the Stuff they are so frienly and helpful. also its location is very close to my office. but the only thing I have noticed this time is that the furniture should be rennovated

Reviews.Title: “DIC visit with Salma”
Reviews.Author: Osasaifpc
Reviews.Content: Excellent arrangements and pleasant stay. Good for business travelers and short stays. Near to the city center and taxi service is available.

Reviews.Title: “good value for money”
Reviews.Author: kimmberly49
Reviews.Content: Good location not far from beach although you will need a car. very cheap, includes breakfast ,they have basic restaurant on site again great value and nice views over the palm . Typical holiday inn express very basic rooms but clean this is not luxury accomodation but for those on a budget provides all you need.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value of money and service, old carpet and sofa covers”
Reviews.Author: Jumaan
Reviews.Content: It has been an excellent service, very friendly and helpful staff, all services were nice and worth money spent. My only comments are: internet charges are hi. second, the rooms carpet and sofa covers are really old.

Reviews.Title: “Average..not recommended”
Reviews.Author: luminousss
Reviews.Content: small rooms, small windows, so economic, cheap, poor poor breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “A nice and practical accomodation in a nice area well served by the metro”
Reviews.Author: BarbaraParis70
Reviews.Content: The hotel is nice and situated in a business area close to Dubai Marina. The metro station is quite close (a few hundred meters) and allows you easily moving in Dubai if you want an alternative to the taxi. In the room there is plenty of space, no luxury and good tradeoff between price and facilities.

Reviews.Title: “Scary Experience”
Reviews.Author: lildude69
Reviews.Content: Stayed there for three days and realized what bad decision it was to check in at this hotel. Adjusted with no room service and other basic amenities but just couldn't believe that despite several reminders nobody came to clear the room or make the bed. The room sucks and the passage had a very bad odor. The staff was indifferent and unhelpful. A sheer waste of money for the price you pay to stay at the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Good for short stay”
Reviews.Author: New17
Reviews.Content: Was there for 2 weeks till my apartment got ready which was little long to stay in such room with only basic needs. Good room but very basic! No bathtop, no room service, no swimming pool & they charge you for internet... i beleive its because of the cheap price you pay. The hotel has good location surrounded by so many companies which made it easy for me to walk to my office every day. Good that staff were helpful at all times

Reviews.Title: “This place is a hole in the wall... stay away if you're expecting something nice.”
Reviews.Author: UnlimitedImagination
Reviews.Content: Upon checking in, we found the lobby to be deceivingly well-appointed... friendly, but fairly incredibly under-trained staff, and an acceptable restaurant and bar area. Little did we know that the ambience would end there. We arrived in our rooms to find overwhelming mildew odors, a pitifully-underwhelming decor, and no amenities whatsoever. I'm rather concerned about sitting on the couch and the stained carpet gives me second thoughts about walking barefoot in the room. My colleagues and I were scattered in different rooms and each was equally disappointing. If you have plans for internet use while staying at this hotel, you'd best think again... not only is it highway robbery style pricing, but the connection is unreliable and shaky at best. Not to mention that WiFi is only available in the lobby. This place is the pits and we'll be relocating tomorrow night.

Reviews.Title: “Not just the worst hotel in Dubai, the worst HIE I have ever been in.”
Reviews.Author: Nikkihell
Reviews.Content: The hotel staff are more than useless, albeit very friendly. Our group had 5 rooms and had no cold water and only a very lukewarm shower. There were broken and missing items such as kettle and tv remote. There was 1 set of towels in each twin room upon arrival. The reception had no change available when purchasing items from the overpriced shop. Security in the baggage room was non-existent. Bar staff couldn't pour a pint to save themselves. I have been to many hotels of the same chain in Europe and USA and this is the worst holiday inn express I have ever seen. Pay the extra for another hotel or face ruining your Dubai experience!

Reviews.Title: “In search of quality.. ,”
Reviews.Author: esom
Reviews.Content: I arrived around 10:30 pm and found out that there was something which looked like a footprint (?) on the bed sheets. I went down and asked to check out immediately. I have been given to options by the manager 1) transfer to another room 2) one night will be deducted from my payment, as I booked a special rate with full advanced payment. I said them you are offering me another soup in a restaurant where I found a fly in it. It is not understandable why I am supposed to pay for one night, although i did not cancel my reservation freely and forced to do it. The most disappointing of the story is, that I am a long term highest level priority club member and a loyal customer to the intrecontinental group of hotels. Rooms are having a strange smell, this hotel requires a renovation and a training for the staff for the quality of services. I must admit staff at the reservation were helpful, but couldn't do much about it. However the Vista rooftop bar and restaurant, which has a seperate entrance next to the hotel is an entirely different world. Excellent Food and excellent drinks. After the bad experience I asked the restaurant staff, whether they belong to the same company and management as the hotel? The restaurant was operated by another company.

Reviews.Title: “4 night stay served it's purpose!”
Reviews.Author: chundell
Reviews.Content: This location is very close to the Emirates mall and Burj al Arab and Palm Jumierah. This location was cool because most tourist attraction were no more than 15 minutes away by car. Airport about 20 minutes. The Vista rooftop bar and hookah lounge has a great view of the palm jamierah and Burj Al Arab and has a 3 for 1 happy hour each night. The room I had was nothing fancy just a king bed, desk, and shower bUt it served it's purpose. Bring your own towels because they only give you one towel daily.

Reviews.Title: “Pathetic Service”
Reviews.Author: Saraniyan
Reviews.Content: I checked into this hotel on Sep 4, i was suppose to stay there for 3 weeks, i vacated the hotel in 5 days and went to IBIS Albarsha. One should have understood how bad the service was, the check in process was pathetic and it took close to 25 min. The internet was not working and it was looked only after 1 day of complaint. There was some bad smell in the restaurant and the timing was also very bad. More over when i checked out i had by mistake left some badam and dry grapes un opened packets in the room itself i was told that they are perishable and more over i have not left anything there. It was so bad of them to tell to me itself that i have not left anything. Then some one called me later and told that it was there and since it was perishable they had disposed it off See the kind of service there.

Reviews.Title: “great hotel for business not so great for holidays”
Reviews.Author: derrum
Reviews.Content: hi stayed here in febuary on business but had plenty of time spare so a mini break to.the hotel is clean and safe but nothing close by to walk to so meaned cabs every time we wanted to get out and about saying that on the last day found the local metro station was only a 5 min walk and was dirt cheap and very clean and modern with trains stopping every 5 or so minutes.and only three stops to the marina and marina mall and direct to the dubai mall so would strongly recommened this over cabs as so cheap and can get you there quicker than even the cabs at times. and no changes goes direct to what seems everywere including the airport.would stay here again not because were it is but how close you are to everything by useing cabs or the metro.however we arrived at the hotel about 9am but checking in was at 3pm they did book us in about 1pm but still waited round the hotel in the heat for 4 hours but i serpose this isnt the hotels fault but would have been nice if they could have checked us in earlier.also used the laundry service for 3 shirts but only got 2 back but they did refund £25 the cost of the shirt but was a pressent so a litte gutted over that.one last thing no pool

Reviews.Title: “No Towels Hotel”
Reviews.Author: elmag
Reviews.Content: The hotel is not bad. Has the minimum requirements. They have a problem with towels though, for the three nights I spend I had only two large towels and one hand towel. Other clients were complaining too in the lobby about that. The room looks poor with old tv. The price rate was 125$ per night.

Reviews.Title: “Great value for money”
Reviews.Author: dannythyboy
Reviews.Content: Even if located a bit outside of everything, the new Dubai Metro is only a 10 minutes walk away. Internet connection is an extra, but otherwise this hotel deserve a praise because the rate was really competitive, the room really ok, the staff friendly and helpful and I really recommend it to everyone who wants a no-frill staying in Dubai, without giving up on quality.

Reviews.Title: “No VPN connection”
Reviews.Author: Hesi
Reviews.Content: I choose teh hotel as the company i work for has their offices near by. The value for money is ok considering a below 100 USD rate. This is a no frills hotel for business only. ( No pool) As business is obviously the focus one would expect that the internet functions flawlessly but to my surprise one can not connect to the company business network via VPN as the internet server of the Hotel surpresses the function. So no e-mail no buisiness communication from the Hotel. The staff is helpfull within their capabilities and possibilities which are limited. I inquired about the VPN issue and was told about the issue honestly whichj i apreciated. A refund of the purchased internet ability was not given Until the VPN issue is fixed I can not recommend to stay here again for any reason

Reviews.Title: “It's smart and Ideal place to stay for Business trip”
Reviews.Author: CleanAbuDhabi
Reviews.Content: As a business traveler, I found exsactly what I need at the Holiday inn Express. Clean, well maintained, good service, quiet, friendly staff and well supervised, good Location and on top of that good value for money.

Reviews.Title: “simply superb n value for money”
Reviews.Author: nashkingrules
Reviews.Content: the location n d view is simply amazing.the staffs were pretty homely n welcoming.and the services that they provide is simply the best thing that we can get for that rate.ive decided 2 stay there whenever i travel there

Reviews.Title: “The Best Hotel with Best Hospitality”
Reviews.Author: Alfi2022
Reviews.Content: the room was big and comfortable, it was definitely worth every cent. the hotel's staff were friendly and helpful and they provided good service. The room i stayed in has a nice view down the street. Bath tub is enjoyable and made my partner feel as cosy as home. Hotel is located near all shopping centre, making it convienience to get affortable stuff. I will definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Stay somewhere else if possible”
Reviews.Author: bigintangibles
Reviews.Content: I stayed in the Holiday Inn Express - Internet City for one night while passing through Dubai and I would recommend, if possible, that you stay somewhere else. I can't comment on whether it's great value-for-money or not, but I found two things very annoying: - Both times I asked the hotel to arrange a taxi for me, instead of getting a regular Dubai taxi, they got a Lexus and insisted I use that. While claiming that it was the same charge, it blatantly wasn't -- I took a regular cab from the airport to the hotel and it cost 65AED. On the way back, it was nearly 100AED. - Upon check-out, despite my office having already informed them that they would pay for the hotel, reception staff insisted my bill was unpaid and asked me to pay for the room with my credit card, essentially double-charging my company. We have since gotten one of those payments back. All in all, there's nothing particularly compelling or otherwise about this hotel, but I'd give it a miss if you can.

Reviews.Title: “"FEELIN OF STAYIN IN A COUNTRY SIDE WHILE STAYIN AT A BIG CITY"”
Reviews.Author: soniajohnson5
Reviews.Content: "HOLIDAY INN EXPRESS" is an amazing hotel, blessed with a lush green ambience.....with beautiful cottages & wide spread gardens....the food here,whether it is an A-LA-CARTE-or bufet, is excellent.....:)

Reviews.Title: “who will bear exxpenses of mind and soul”
Reviews.Author: qac178
Reviews.Content: it was my exam after 6 hours when i reached the hotel i was informed that my confirm booking is cancelled. i got confirmed booking through visa card from the same card i visted united states and london and even that night i came with emirates airline the ticket i bought from same card.in short i was controlling my temparament as if i hav to apper in exam after few hours .the administration refuse any way room so i went searching out horrible night if i am going far could not come back in time so what i did i know but who is going to ask those people who did that what i felt the room charges around alll hotels at that time more than 1000 dhrams so could be that reason they made business and made me suffer . i dont know still i am busy i want to do some thing like to put file against them but where still need to search ...................................... dr qamar ali

Reviews.Title: “Doesnt feel like Dubai”
Reviews.Author: avid_SAP_traveller
Reviews.Content: Thats what happens when you cut corners. You would like some pleasure and indulgence when you are in Dubai and if thats not on your wish list then this could just be the place for you. Great place but could be better

Reviews.Title: “would like to stay again in this hotel”
Reviews.Author: abbyvalsan
Reviews.Content: excellent service renderd by the smiling staff would l;ike to visit you all again thank u very much for ur service

Reviews.Title: “HOME AWAY FROM HOME”
Reviews.Author: jobinjohn
Reviews.Content: Nice hotel. I preffer to stay here when i come to dubai next time. Hotel staff and mangers were second to nothing. Excellent service. Good to remember. Thanks.

Reviews.Title: “A place to be....”
Reviews.Author: smilez76
Reviews.Content: TWO THUMBS UP!!!!!!!!!! Good food, great service, nice rooms with reasonable rates.... feels like im staying in a 5 star hotel. I will surely go back there on my next visit.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel, Great service, Great Price”
Reviews.Author: kaleblloyd
Reviews.Content: Found this hotel on Priority Club website as I am a member. Hotel is great value for money. Location is ok as you can catch a Taxi to many places you want at a very resonable price. Staff were very approachable at reception,Housekeeping and restaraunt. They were very friendly and provided awesome service. The Room was sufficent. Modern and clean. No problems with the room. Vista the restaraunt at the top is a very nice place to eat dinner. The food was very yummy and reasonably priced. The breakfast in the morning is a very nice way to start the day also. Overall, I am very impressed with the whole experience of staying at Holiday Inn Express for the 6 nights. 10/10

Reviews.Title: “This hotel is outstanding!!”
Reviews.Author: RobGoddard
Reviews.Content: Well appointed, clean and best of all the staff are so welcoming and professional. Something of a rarity these days. I have travelled the globe for over 30 years and the standard of service mis nothing short of perfection. The staff's sole aim is to ensure client statisfaction. I stayed there for 3 weeks and observed a consistent high service. I now have my own place in Dubai, but still visit the hotel for dinner and a few drinks.

Reviews.Title: “Cheap but basic”
Reviews.Author: Toplus
Reviews.Content: This is a cheap hotel for the facilities it provides, although its location is not great. In any case, you only get the basic package, with a lot of issues which can be very much improved. The following are just some examples: - Internet is not free, and in fact, is fairly expensive (20 dhm per hour). I tried the cable connection at the room, and it is also quite slow, specially on the uploads (e.g sending e-mails with attachments) - Breakfast, although complementary, is very basic - Room could be cleaner, specially furniture and corners of the bathroom - No amenities by default, although you can ask for them - Service isn't great: they lost a fax, took dirty towels but didn't give new ones, took forever to get an iron, door card keeps on needing to be re-coded or the door won't open, etc - We warned about getting a taxi from the front desk: they provide a hotel car without a counter and ask you a certain amount at the end of the ride, which is 10-20% more expensive that a regular taxi. So, summarizing, if you need a cheap accommodation around this area, come here, but don't expect much.

Reviews.Title: “Best Value for Money hotel ever in Dubai”
Reviews.Author: shenaniganxx
Reviews.Content: I have travelled many times to Dubai for work and leisure, and stayed in various hotels. This time around I wanted a good value for money hotel for my brief stay. I found Holiday in Express Internet City a fantastic experience. Its is well located with easy access. The staff were amazingly courteous and helpful, which was something you dont expect much of in a budget hotel. The room was very clean, well kept, and had all the basic facilities you require with no frills. Interestingly, for a budget hotel, they have a good bar and restaurant, and what I enjoyed most was a lovely open-air restaurant and bar in the rooftop of the hotel which had a great ambience and a lovely view of a Dubai. I will definitely return to Holiday Inn Express for my next visit.

Reviews.Title: “Good value if all you want is a place to sleep.”
Reviews.Author: wazoom
Reviews.Content: Perfect for our needs. As a resident of Abu Dhabi this was a great place to stay if you want a night on in Dubai. Cheaper end of the scale but staff were very helpful, especially compared to the Ibis chain in Dubai. Breakfast included. Would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “for short stays OK”
Reviews.Author: elvir79
Reviews.Content: This is the 3rd time I am visitng this hotel and would just drop a short view on it - while minimalistic (for example no complimentary drinking water, internet is not complimentary, no room service, soap and shampoo all in one in a tube you need to squeeze) etc., the hotel is still good value for the money and for shorter stays up to 3 days. Given that my company is near by, it suits me quite well. You still have a mini bar (empty) which you can stuff with ur own stuff, it is totally OK to order "food delivery" from outside restaurants and the reception people will notify you that you have something to pick up, water kettle with some sugar and tea&coffee bags are provided complimentary. If you mind your budget and are ready to compromise on perks for shorter stays, this place is OK.

Reviews.Title: “Worth it”
Reviews.Author: Matale
Reviews.Content: I''ve been staying in this two star hotel which should deserves four star statusfor 04 nights. My. stay was very comfortable which ic value for my budjet (specially being a business traveller). The staff was excellent with very courtius manners.

Reviews.Title: “Nice time”
Reviews.Author: Manoj93
Reviews.Content: I Came to dubai for a short visit earlier of this month,I was there alomost 4 days,It was my first time stayed in an express hotel,Science its a limited service hotel i fell very much comfertable of my stay.Saff was very nice and very helpful,They were always there to help the guest,sometimes they go for bit an extra miles to help guest.The vista restaurant was excelent with the view and the food,Its having the nice view of Palms.Housekeeping staff was realy nice.Even some of my friends said that were happy too.

Reviews.Title: “Clean”
Reviews.Author: CleanAbuDhabi
Reviews.Content: Came for short business trip. its my first time in this hotel as I looked for something within my budget. I was surprised to actually find very good quality! the hotel was also very clean. wonderfull restaurant on the rooftop worth a visit with fantastic few to jumeirah palm

Reviews.Title: “Cheap business hotel, OK location”
Reviews.Author: Veronika_BH
Reviews.Content: The hotel is 5-minutes drive from Dubai Marina or 10-minutes drive from Wild Wadi Aquapark, but in Dubai you have to count on driving anywhere anyway - so I don´t consider location the key. Taxis is easily available in front of the hotel. The room was spacious but the furniture is old, both the sofa and carpet were stained. The beds and bathroom were clean though. There is only some multi-purpose soap available in the bathroom, some other stuff can can brought to the room on demand. That is just not convenient at all. I was happy that the room was at least quiet at night. The breakfast is very plain, no real selection. That was little disappointing given the usual Middle Eastern sort of buffet breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “Not worth it!”
Reviews.Author: basali
Reviews.Content: If you are out all day and looking for a cheap bed and bathroom for 1- 2 nights then maybe this hotel is what you are seeking. I've been to B&Bs better than this so-called hotel! No hot breakfast in the morning, no room service, nothing in the mini bar, stained firniture, and the rooms wreaked of smoke and cheap cologne! The only saving grace is its location and the customer service level of its staff. Won't reccomend it to any of my family members and friends.

Reviews.Title: “Basic but adequate for my purpose”
Reviews.Author: cassinigirl
Reviews.Content: I visited Dubai for business on my own to meet with customers. As a young woman travelling on her own I had a few reservations after reading some reviews. Yes, it was basic but in all honesty it had everything I needed. A bed, bathroom and TV for the lonely nights when I wasn't out with customers. the room was clean and although I asked for a smoing room and got one, I wouldn't recommend that. It was very smokey when I went in and no way to vent the room which was a little off putting. The staff were very pleasant and helped me with questions, advise and arranged taxis. The hotel taxi costs a bit more than normal taxis but the guys know where they are going and i would recommend using this if your a lone traveller. I didnt try vista but heard great reviews I can strongly recommend Karma cafe though a wide choice and absolutely beautiful food. All in all, the staff were great, the room was clean and it was very cheap for my stay for 3 nights. The high speed internet access was not high speed at all though.

Reviews.Title: “Quick Stopover”
Reviews.Author: ALLIGATOR9
Reviews.Content: I had to stopover in Dubai for a day for work on my way from New York to Mumbai. My asociate had boked a room for me at the Hlidan Inn Expres where I cold shower & get a quick nap of 2-3hrs. The hotel is pleasant & conveniently located near media & internet city. I had my first meeting in the morning and after brunch went to freshen up & get sleep. The room is nice & comfortable. The shower was good as well. I went for a meting again in the evening before returning in he night for a quick shower. Very convenient and not expensive.

Reviews.Title: “Great Food, Clean Rooms”
Reviews.Author: Subpilot
Reviews.Content: The rooms were clean, is in a very safe location and the food was very good. The best Lamb I ever had!

Reviews.Title: “Great business value and exceptional customer service!!”
Reviews.Author: KentuckyTraveldog
Reviews.Content: I spent the month of November 2009 at this property on business. Other reviewers have adequately described the facilities and amenities so I'll comment on the exceptional customer service I had during my stay. The front desk, restaurant, and housekeeping always responded promptly and courteously to my request. At the airport upon departure I encountered and unexpected excess baggage issue. Having exhausted all my options to resolve the issue and with my flight departing soon. I called the hotel and to my great relief they made arrangements for me. I highly recommend this property for value conscious business and leisure travelers in Dubai.

Reviews.Title: “OK...but not for an extended stay.”
Reviews.Author: ST88
Reviews.Content: The hotel itself is clean and modern. The rooms are a decent size, the beds are comfortable and the bathroom is generally ok, though it would have been nice if there was a bath also. The staff are friendly and polite. Housekeeping do tend to knock on your door early, often waking you so if you don't want to be disturbed then its best to stick the "do not disturb" sign on the front of the door before you go to sleep. The gym is situated on the 1st floor...its functional. Breakfast after 2 days got very repetitive...white or brown bread or mini croissants/pain au chocolats...3 varieties of yogurts, cereal, hot milk, cheese (not allowed to melt the cheese on toast through the toaster), grapefruit and a selection of juices/coffee/tea. Every morning its the same. However what the hotel does not tell you is that there is a supermarket open from either 9 or 10 am until 11pm called Aswaaq about a 5-10 minute walk from the hotel. There is also a pharmacy on the same side of the road as the supermarket and the most perfect nail salon. Honestly the best nail spa we have ever been to, the nails are done fabulously as are the other treatments including the full body massage - definately worth a try. There is a pharmacy about units down from the Nail Spa and about 3 units before Aswaaq supermarket. There is also a Subway around the corner, another eatery and a 24 hr ATM though the hotel has a 24 hour atm in the lobby. The food the hotel sells in the lobby is much more expensive than in the supermarkets so it is worth checking that out as soon as you get there - there is a small fridge in the room which comes in handy. The VISTA restaurant on the 5th floor in the building next to the hotel is absolutely beautiful. The food is 1st class though it can get slightly pricey if you have more than one course with drinks...for a party of two with a main course, two side and two drinks it came to 220 dhs though the hotel does offer you a 20% discount which comes in useful so for a party of more than two it will be expensive however the food is worth it and the views across Dubai are beautiful. In addition there are two TV's situated by the bar. The hotel itself is situated in the middle of nowhere it seems. Apart from the free shuttle to the Mall of the Emirates - recommended and a free shuttle to the Dubai Outlet Mall - don't even waste your time, taxi's are needed to get everywhere. Check and double check the pick up times from the hotel to the Mall and the Mall to the hotel because you may well find the sheet of times you are given by the hotel do not correlate with the times given in the Mall. We found that the Dubai Taxi, the cream ones with Taxi written on top were generally cheaper than the ones the hotel called for you to use each day so if possible stick to them. Jumeriah Beach is 10-15 mins max away and shouldnt cost more than 25 dhs each way. The "open beach" is free and the "closed beach" is approx 5 dhs but the open beach is all you need. The Gold Souk is approx half an hour away and costs between 50-60 dhs each way but it is one of the most worthwhile trips to do. To make getting around more cost effective, particualarly to get to more of the Malls such as the new Dubai Mall it is worth while nothing that you can get a cab to hotels local to HIExpress including the Westin Hotel and Raddison Blu and pick up the free shuttles to the Mall put on by those hotels. The free shuttle schedule and hotels it serves at can be found on the Dubai Mall website. The desert safari night is ok, about 220 dhs per person - well for adults. Did we enjoy it - yes. Did we expect more for our money - yes. Would we do it again - probably not. All in all it is an OK hotel, but not suited for an extended stay and because it doesnt have a pool you are forced to go to the beach in order to catch some rays. If your looking for a luxurious stay where its easy to get around then I wouldn't recommend the hotel due to its location and what it lacks - a pool but for somewhere to lie your head at night and sleep peacefully - its fine.

Reviews.Title: “Great value for frequent travellers to Dubai”
Reviews.Author: imzy78
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 2 nights in August. It was our fourth stay at this hotel and we will probably stay there again next time we visit Dubai. The rooms are small with just enough space for the 4 of us. We had our son sleep on the sofa bed and our baby daughter in a cot . It is quite basic but good if you intend on spending most of the time out and about in Dubai. There is one bar and a restaurant in the hotel and there is also 'Vista' another restaurant/bar which you can only access from outside. If you are hiring a car this is a good option as there is lots of parking available. The staff are friendly and helpful. I think the overall experience is exceptional considering the price.

Reviews.Title: “decent”
Reviews.Author: FBSQ
Reviews.Content: peaceful location near dubai knowledge village and internet city. Ample car parking and decent price of 100 dollars for a room for 2. could be attractive if priced around 75 dollars. breakfast was simple and not too many choices. ample car parking is available and located minutes from the new dubai area of marina, jumeirah beach residence, mall of emirates etc..the access to the hotel could be difficult except by cab or car as it is not in the heart of the city. would stay again if similar price or better deals!

Reviews.Title: “Great for a short stopover”
Reviews.Author: Canada-Korea
Reviews.Content: .We stopped in Dubai for a couple of nights on our way to Italy. Taxi drivers had trouble finding the place sometimes but all in all better than expected. Its a budget hotel and a good price for a good location. They also offered a free shuttle to the Mall of the Emirates.

Reviews.Title: “Vista, the restaurant, is a hidden gem”
Reviews.Author: Dubai_foodie
Reviews.Content: I'm a Dubai-based journalist. I've never stayed at the hotel so can't comment on the rooms, but I visited Vista to do a review and feel obliged to shout from the rooftops how great it was. I have to say I wasn't expecting much - this is a Holiday Inn Express for God's sake - but the food was genuinely delicious and the staff were unfailingly polite and helpful. In a city where many restaurants charge half a month's wages for a bottle of water and the food is ok but not great, Vista really stood out as somewhere charging reasonable prices for good grub. Furthermore, the decor was stylish and the views of the Burj Al Arab, if outside temperatures will allow you to check them out, are superb.

Reviews.Title: “when on a string ... it's fine”
Reviews.Author: belgian_professor
Reviews.Content: Stayed 3 nights at Holiday Inn Express. Usually stay at more upscale places (4 star and up) but client booked this one for me so there was no discussion. Overall, I can't say it was a bad experience. Lobby is large and clean with accommodating staff, although their English is mediocre. Rooms are small but tidy and bathroom is as big as many of the more upscale and expensive places; water pressure in shower was good too. No noise issues as often happens in other Dubai hotels (thin walls & loud guests). Choice at breakfast is limited, but the quality is quite okay. Gym is tiny and a few of the machines were not working (under repair). Taxi drivers know the place, so no need to wait for hours and hours for a ride. In short, this hotel is fine if you're on a budget in Dubai.

Reviews.Title: “wouldnt rate highly”
Reviews.Author: gokiwiNz
Reviews.Content: ok, stay, should rename to budget rather than express. Room ok, breakfast limited, reasonable expensive but hey its the middle east.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Sumeet_7
Reviews.Content: We needed to attend the book fair at Abu Dhabi and also had appointments in Dubai. This is almost at the edge of Dubai towards Abu Dhabi so the hotel suited us fine. Always missed the traffic. Very convenient if you are renting. Free parking. Very clean. Nice breakfast. Really enjoyed my stay.

Reviews.Title: “Sightseeing Holiday”
Reviews.Author: tennismum
Reviews.Content: As a base this hotel met all our requirements. The staff were very helpful and pleasant and always greeted you with a smile and hello. The location was excellent for getting anywhere you wanted to go, the taxis are very cheap. We had excellent accommodation and washing facilities and the breakfast was lovely, cold buffet, good selection of foods. I would highly recommend using one of these hotels for this type of holiday, it offers everything you need, good value all round and I would not hesitate to use it again. Also it benefitted from having an excellent restaurant called the Vista next to it, I had some of the best food there and I have eaten in many of the Restaurants in Dubai, put it on your list of must dos.

Reviews.Title: “2 star hotel - 5 star service”
Reviews.Author: dbconstruct
Reviews.Content: Always stay at this hotel when I am in Dubai. Management and staff are friendly,efficient and attentive without being sycophantic. (Big problem in this part of the world.) The rooms are large,always immaculate in regards to cleanliness and the housekeeping staff provide the same standard of service as their counterparts "downstairs." I wouldn't want to stay anywhere else when I am in Dubai.

Reviews.Title: “So cool enough to visit more and more”
Reviews.Author: Atto4
Reviews.Content: A Five stars service from all hotel staff and managers. I have worked in many parts of the world and stayed in some serious hotels but nothing compares with the relaxed atmosphere in this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Eh, it was ok.”
Reviews.Author: chi-towngirl79
Reviews.Content: Considering I spent only about $150 per night, I wasn't expecting much. Yes, the hotel is a little out of the way but I found that most of the city is spread out as it is. There were usually taxis available in front and if not, the bellhop would get one to pick up quickly. I was annoyed by the internet fees, especially because the connection was fairly slow. All in all, it was just an average hotel in an awesome city. Next time, I will probably stay closer to city center.

Reviews.Title: “a great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: David_Nightingale
Reviews.Content: I don't normally review hotels but as I stayed at the Holiday Inn at exactly the same time as the previous reviewer I thought I'd just add that I found the staff helpful and considerate, my shower worked fine, the bed was comfortable, and the hotel was ideally placed for the event I was attending. As for the internet: yes, it was expensive, by UK standards at least, but it worked and was reliable. I should also add that I stayed here last year, would stay here again, and have no issues in recommending this hotel to anyone else.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Stay”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: I have stayed in express by Holiday inn Internet City early Jan 2009 and one of the nicest simple standard rooms. The hotel atmosphere from the check-in until check out was great. It is really wonderful management to keep the place warm; friendly and very peaceful atmosphere.

HotelInfo.Name: Holiday Inn Express Dubai-Internet City
HotelInfo.Address: Tecom Zone, Knowledge City | PO Box 282647, Dubai, United Arab Emirates
